instanceVariables.name: scrollViewID
instanceVariables.desc: an ID to attach to this scroll view, since this shouldn't be part of the UI family

instanceVariables.name: scrollXHandleID
instanceVariables.desc: the ID of the slider handle to use

instanceVariables.name: scrollYHandleID
instanceVariables.desc: the ID of the slider handle to use

instanceVariables.name: scrollMargins
instanceVariables.desc: margins to pad around scroll view bounds

instanceVariables.name: scrollViewOriginalLayer
instanceVariables.desc: the layer this was created on, to store for dynamic layers
